analysis.description:
IMedalData (/unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#159-183) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#167-168)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#168-169)

BattleboardsSupport.erectBarrier (/unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#215-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-battleboardData.createTile(battleboardId,_barrierType,barrierStrength,_position,0,0,0,0,address(this),0) (/unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#225-228)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/41/0xd16c13da73f3aa1cb4fd4ddfd758fad869f166d6.sol#78-83:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
